Namespace AssemblerLib

Classes

Assemblage

A class that manages Assemblages, including AssemblyObjects, their Topology, HeuristicsSettings, ExogenousSettings, and all related data.

AssemblyObject

Assemblage Object with extended connectivity and collision-check properties

Field

Stores spatially-distributed scalar, vector and integer weights values

MeshEnvironment

this class can give more properties to the environment objects

Tensor

Stores arrays of scalar, vector and integer weight values

Utilities

A static Utilities class grouping some useful fields and methods

XData

A simple Xtra/Xtended Data container

Structs

ExogenousSettings

A structure that manages settings for Exogenous elements (environment, Field)

Handle

Handle structure for connection handles

HeuristicsSettings

A structure that manages settings for Heuristics (rules, criteria)

Rule

Structure storing indexes to automate Assemblage operations

Support

Support class for embedded structural consistency - NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

Enums

MeshEnvironment.Type

Delegates

Assemblage.ComputeCandidatesValuesMethod<T>

Delegate type for computing candidates (sender) values

Assemblage.ComputeReceiverMethod<T>

Delegate type for computing a single receiver value

Assemblage.EnvironmentCheckMethod

Delegate type for environment container behavior (collision or inclusion)

Assemblage.SelectWinnerMethod<T>

Delegate method for choosing winner index from sender values
